Headline: #85 Central &  #85A North Central, #68 Northwest Highway, #92 Foster Temporary Reroute near Milwaukee/Gale
ShortDescription: 85 Central & 85A North Central, WB 68 Northwest Highway, EB 92 Foster buses are rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Gale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central &  #85A North Central, Westbound #68 Northwest Highway, Eastbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Gale.

#85 Central &  #85A North Central  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Gale, Higgins and  resume their normal route on Central.

Westbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Gale, Higgins, Central, Northwest Highway over normal route.

Eastbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Gale, Higgins, Central, Foster and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
